statements: SELECT * FROM stock_locations;
SELECT location_name, capacity FROM stock_locations ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT location_name, aisle_number, shelf_number FROM stock_locations WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT * FROM stock_locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT location_name, shelf_number FROM stock_locations WHERE aisle_number BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM stock_locations WHERE aisle_number < 5 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT location_name, shelf_number FROM stock_locations WHERE capacity > 100 AND aisle_number BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT location_id, location_name, aisle_number FROM stock_locations WHERE capacity >= 50 AND shelf_number > 2 ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM stock_locations WHERE location_name LIKE '%A%' AND shelf_number <= 3;
SELECT location_id, location_name, aisle_number, shelf_number FROM stock_locations WHERE capacity < 75 ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_locations;
SELECT location_name, capacity FROM stock_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM item_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT location_name, total_items FROM stock_locations WHERE total_items < 1000;
SELECT location_name, capacity, last_update FROM stock_locations WHERE capacity >= 500 ORDER BY last_update ASC;
SELECT * FROM stock_locations
SELECT location_name, total_items FROM stock_locations ORDER BY total_items DESC
SELECT location_name, capacity, total_items FROM stock_locations WHERE capacity > 100
SELECT location_name, total_items FROM stock_locations WHERE last_update > '2021-10-01' AND capacity < total_items
SELECT l.location_name, i.item_name, i.quantity FROM stock_locations l JOIN item_inventory i ON l.location_id = i.location_id
SELECT * FROM StockLocations;
SELECT location_name, location_type FROM StockLocations WHERE max_capacity > 100;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT location_name, max_capacity FROM StockLocations WHERE location_type = 'Warehouse';
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM StockLocations WHERE location_type = 'warehouse';
SELECT location_name, max_capacity FROM StockLocations WHERE max_capacity > 1000 ORDER BY max_capacity DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM Products WHERE category = 'electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT StockLocations.location_name, Products.product_name, Inventory.quantity FROM StockLocations JOIN Inventory ON StockLocations.location_id = Inventory.location_id JOIN Products ON Inventory.product_id = Products.product_id;
SELECT location_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM StockLocations JOIN Inventory ON StockLocations.location_id = Inventory.location_id GROUP BY location_name HAVING total_quantity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT warehouse_id, warehouse_name FROM warehouses ORDER BY warehouse_id DESC;
SELECT location_name FROM locations WHERE location_type = 'Office';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products p JOIN stock_records sr ON p.product_id = sr.product_id WHERE sr.quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE location_type = 'Retail' ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT warehouse_id, warehouse_name, location_name FROM warehouses INNER JOIN locations ON warehouses.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE warehouse_id = 101;
SELECT product_name, product_category, quantity FROM products INNER JOIN stock_records ON products.product_id = stock_records.product_id WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;

SELECT location_id, location_name, COUNT(warehouse_id) AS num_warehouses FROM locations LEFT JOIN warehouses ON locations.location_id = warehouses.location_id GROUP BY location_id HAVING num_warehouses >= 2;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM Products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT location_id, location_name, location_description FROM StockLocations WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT worker_id, worker_name, department FROM WarehouseWorkers WHERE department = 'Shipping';
SELECT product_id, quantity_ordered, order_date FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC, quantity_ordered ASC;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE quantity_in_stock > 100;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM Products WHERE quantity_in_stock < 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT location_id, location_name, location_description FROM StockLocations WHERE location_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT worker_id, worker_name, department FROM WarehouseWorkers WHERE department = 'Shipping' ORDER BY worker_name ASC;
SELECT Orders.order_id, Products.product_name, Orders.quantity_ordered, Orders.order_date FROM Orders JOIN Products ON Orders.product_id = Products.product_id WHERE Orders.quantity_ordered >= 10;
